name: Fido (Available in the Rogers store)
address: Fido (Available in the Rogers store), 4820 Kingsway Unit FK102, Burnaby, BC V5H 4M1

featured_reviews.review_id: The worst service I ever had. Very rude and they asked me to wait for almost 40 mins. Fido should really provide proper training to their reps.
featured_reviews.review_text: The worst service I ever had. Very rude and they asked me to wait for almost 40 mins. Fido should really provide proper training to their reps.

featured_reviews.review_id: Very poor service, yesterday they took more than an hour to finish the porting request, today got a message that it is not approved and I have to provide a temporary account number which is not provided by them or explained by them. Never purchase SIM here
featured_reviews.review_text: Very poor service, yesterday they took more than an hour to finish the porting request, today got a message that it is not approved and I have to provide a temporary account number which is not provided by them or explained by them. Never purchase SIM here

featured_reviews.review_id:
Hello guys
!!Apple store finances through FIDO!!
You can buy Iphones from apple store instead of going to this store.
I was looking for 256gb iPhone in blue,
They were not having it and salesperson told me no near store in BC have it and which was completely false. So I opted for 128gb instead.

Call 611,
This number is FIDO helpline for fido users!

Salesperson a big guy there, you might see him,
told me I have to take insurance if I need to get mobile iphone from there because my plan was $43 which is less than $50! So he added it by saying you have to get it!! I called FIDO and cancelled it! So I never recommend it to go to this store.
Thanks
Have a nice shopping day!!!
(Note-I only know about big guy that he is dishonest rest all seems good to me!!)

featured_reviews.review_id: The sales reps working here are very dishonest and are not transparent with their customers. They promised US calling to get the sale commission and then when I got charged they are denying everything. These reps are diluting the brand image with their poor ethics. Please I highly recommend that you go to other stores and not this location unless you want to be scammed.
featured_reviews.review_text: The sales reps working here are very dishonest and are not transparent with their customers. featured_reviews.review_id: Hiren and Nicholas were very helpful and gave me the best deal and helped me with accessories too. 100% recommend this kiosk over the other store in the mall, they were rude the employees name was romin. Whereas employees in this kiosk were completely opposite and amazing

featured_reviews.review_id: Hiren was very helpful and a very sweet manager, we initially came asking to port two lines but he gave us the best deal and we ported 6 lines. 100% recommend coming to this kiosk and taking his help!

featured_reviews.review_id: The price that I'm paying right now is not what they told me. I called and went to the story multiple times, they said they will fix it, but I'm still paying the unchanged price, which is way more higher than they promised. Literally scam.

featured_reviews.review_id: I got a new number from here the discount was great and the service was also too good specially the assistant manager hiren guided us throughout the process and helped us get better deal.
